name: Api\Response\Warning
description: See the properties of a warning returned by the Apple News API.

properties.name: keypath
properties.description: An array of field names that uniquely identifies a field in the JSON input of the request.

properties.name: message
properties.description: A user friendly, detailed explanation of the non-fatal warning.

properties.name: value
properties.description: If applicable, the value supplied in the request for the field specified by keyPath.
